content:
From: webmaster@hl7.org
A new project proposal is available for your review - Develop an implementation guide(s) for exchange of data regarding a patientâ€™s communication, cognition, hearing, and swallowing function to improve transitions of care across healthcare settings.

You are invited to review the following project proposal at https://jira.hl7.org/browse/PSS-1788 and provide comments. Instructions for how to review a project proposal are available here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/How+to+Create+and+Review+a+Project+Proposal
